Package com.example.eventlink_qr_pro

Class BrowseEventsActivityTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlink_qr_pro.BrowseEventsActivityTest
public class BrowseEventsActivityTest extends Object
UI tests for the BrowseEventsActivity of the EventLink QR Pro app. This class uses Espresso to interact with the UI and Espresso Intents to verify navigation and intent sending within the activity. It ensures that UI components behave as expected when interacted with by the user.

  • Field Details

    • activityRule

      public androidx.test.ext.junit.rules.ActivityScenarioRule<BrowseEventsActivity> activityRule
      Sets up an ActivityScenarioRule for BrowseEventsActivity to launch the activity before each test. This rule provides a convenient way to test the activity under different conditions.

  • Constructor Details

    • BrowseEventsActivityTest

      public BrowseEventsActivityTest()

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Initializes Espresso Intents before each test. This setup is necessary for intent verification and to mock intents for actions within the test.

    • tearDown

      public void tearDown()
      Releases Espresso Intents after each test to clean up and avoid memory leaks. This teardown process ensures that the testing environment is reset for the next test.

    • testBackButton

      public void testBackButton()
      Verifies that the back button functions correctly within BrowseEventsActivity. The expected behavior is that clicking the back button navigates the user to the previous activity or screen.
